.. _`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.index.__module__`:

======
Dialog
======

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



This module provides sets of components to render different types of dialogs,
as well as typical components which are rendered inside a dialog.

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Dialog.Dialog`
and derived components are containers that display their
children in a modal dialog simulated with CSS and Javascript.

Displaying Buttons in Dialogs
-----------------------------

The module :ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Buttons.__module__` provides
a set of stock buttons to use in Dialogs. If your dialog will not use any
buttons, you may omit the footer of the dialog by passing in the property
``hideFooter``. The components
:ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.SingleSelection.SingleSelection` and
:ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.SingleSelection.SingleListSelection` can
be used to display dialogs without a footer.

Resizing
--------

Dialogs can either be configured to use a fixed width or be resizable.
The properties ``size`` and ``sizes`` can be supplied a value or a list
of values from the constants ``SIZE_*``.

Options
-------

Options are special boxes for notifying the user of events, or letting the
user make simple choices, such as ok/cancel or yes/no. Option Components
provided are:

- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Options.Alert`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Options.Message`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Options.Notice`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Options.YesNo`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Options.YesNoCancel`

.. `cs-web-components-base-dialogs.Dialog._OptionProps`:

React Properties for Options
----------------------------

Option Dialogs require a special subset of Dialog Properties listed below.

+-------------+--------+------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| Name        | Type   | Default    | Description                                       |
+=============+========+============+===================================================+
| title       | string | \-         | The title displayed in the dialogs header         |
+-------------+--------+------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| onHide      | func   | \-         | Function that is invoked when the dialog wants    |
|             |        |            | to hide itself                                    |
+-------------+--------+------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| size        | string | SIZE_SMALL | The size of the dialog                            |
+-------------+--------+------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| show        | bool   | true       | True if the dialog should be shown                |
+-------------+--------+------------+---------------------------------------------------+
